message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This exceptional item comes packed with features that ensure efficiency and satisfaction. I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. For this unique opportunity, I am offering it to you for $150. Let me know if this aligns with your expectations or if you'd like to discuss further.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. I'm looking to save some money and I'm not sure if it's worth the full $150. Can we meet in the middle at $125?
